channel.title: space on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in space on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: Microsoft releases DirectStorage: ‘a new era of fast load times and detailed worlds in PC games’ (3 minute read) Microsoft’s DirectStorage API has arrived for Windows.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-08
item.description: Samsung confirms hackers stole Galaxy source code (2 minute read) Samsung has confirmed that hackers successfully stole internal company data and source code.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-29
item.description: Apple offering engineers $180,000 bonuses to prevent poaching (2 minute read) The employee poaching war between Apple and Meta is heating up, with Apple now offering top engineering talents stock bonuses worth up to $180,000 to prevent them from defecting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-26
item.description: Blue Origin announces plans for a commercial space station (3 minute read) Blue Origin is working on creating a space station with Sierra Space.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-15
item.description: Microsoft to shut down LinkedIn in China (1 minute read) Microsoft will shut down its local version of LinkedIn in China due to a significantly more challenging operating environment and greater compliance requirements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-12
item.description: Microsoft and Nvidia team up to train one of the world’s largest language models (7 minute read) Microsoft and Nvidia have trained what they claim is the largest and most capable AI-powered language model to date.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-14
item.description: Zoom is adding live translation services and coming to Facebook VR (2 minute read) Zoom plans to add real-time transcription for up to 30 languages and real-time translation across as many as 12 languages by the end of next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-14
item.description: Amazon details new warehouse robots, ‘Ernie’ and ‘Bert’ (2 minute read) Amazon is testing out two new robots, Ernie and Bert, to try to reduce strenuous movements for workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-01
item.description: Google Photos' free unlimited storage ends tomorrow (2 minute read) From June 1, any photos uploaded to Google Photos will count towards the user’s storage limit unless the photos come from a Pixel phone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-01
item.description: Apple just paid a record $25 million to buy a Sundance movie (2 minute read) Apple paid roughly $25 million for a movie at the Sundance Film Festival, the largest deal ever at the event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-14
item.description: Google trained a trillion-parameter AI language model (5 minute read) Generally speaking, the more parameters a machine learning model has, the better it is at its task.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-29
item.description: TikTok’s one-night Ratatouille musical will star some of Broadway’s biggest names (2 minute read) Ratatouille: The TikTok Musical will have a lineup of Broadway’s biggest names for its January 1st streaming performance.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-09
item.description: Kombucha was just the beginning. This designer wants to create a bacteria-based food industry (2 minute read) Plurality Now is a conceptual restaurant that offers a menu of food derived from bacterial cultures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-21
item.description: Lucid beats Tesla Model S Plaid prototype on racetrack with its own tri-motor Air test vehicle (2 minute read) Lucid has beaten the Tesla Model S Plaid prototype’s Laguna Seca race track record with its Air electric vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-17
item.description: Facebook’s Infinite Office is a virtual office space for the WFH crowd (1 minute read) Facebook Connect is introducing a new virtual office experience called Infinite Office.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-24
item.description: Elon Musk reveals Boring tunnels as he aims to eliminate city traffic (3 minute read) Elon Musk has revealed renders of the first commercial station being built by his tunnel-digging company.
